review: I was comparison shopping between this and the Chromecast. I am happy that I got this instead. I really like that it's connected straight to my Amazon prime account, so I can watch all my movies and listen to my music. Amazon prime music is amazing. I really love this device. The set-up was super easy and really quick too.

review: I had two TV's with "built in internet" features, a Vizio and a Samsung.  Both of them constantly had problems loading videos, (Amazon, Netflix, YouTube) the Vizeo had a minimal menu for Amazon, and both would need frequent reloads, while playing a video/movie.  I now use an Amazon Fire TV stick on both TVs, with none of the aforementioned problems.  Also the menus are much more comparable to what one gets on a computer.
author: Robert L. Vessel "New Age Buddihst"

review: Works better than my Apple TV. Happy something works.

review: I bought my Dad and Amazon Fire Stick to replace a "Smart" Sony Blu-Ray player that he absolutely hated. I made the recommendation because I already own a full size Amazon Fire TV and love it. Needless to say he went out and bought a new TV and got rid of his Roku 3 because he was amazed at how well this little device works!I am going to go pick up one for myself to replace my PS3 as my Media Hub.
